name: purescript-graphql-client
description: A typesafe graphql client for purescript.

scripts.bundle: cd codegen/schema && spago bundle --bundle-type module --module GraphQL.Client.CodeGen.Js --outfile '../../gen-schema-bundled.mjs'
scripts.patch: npm run bundle && gcam 'update bundle' --allow-empty && npm version patch &&  npm publish && pulp publish
scripts.npm-major-version: npm run bundle && gcam 'update bundle' --allow-empty && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.patch-old: npm run bundle && gcam 'update bundle' --allow-empty && npm version patch && pulp version patch && npm publish && pulp publish
